item.title: Portuguese Language available
item.description:
Portuguese Language Package for SobiPro is available to download and in Repository.
Now SobiPro can be used in 23 different languages!
item.author: noreply@sigsiu.net (Sigrid Suski)

item.title: Turkish Language available
item.description:
Turkish Language Package for SobiPro is available to download and in Repository.
Now SobiPro can be used in 22 different languages!
item.author: noreply@sigsiu.net (Sigrid Suski)

item.title: Calendar Field updated
item.description:
The updated version includes some bug fixes and has 11 new languages added.
Download the Calendar Field from our Download Directory or directly via SobiPro Repository!
item.author: noreply@sigsiu.net (Sigrid Suski)

item.title: Several Languages updated - Part II
item.description: German, Polish, Swedish and French Languages updated and available to download in the Download Directory or directly from SobiPro Repository.
item.author: noreply@sigsiu.net (Sigrid Suski)

item.title: SobiPro 1.0.7 stable released
item.description:
We released SobiPro 1.0.7 stable today.
This is a maintenance release which solves a few problems.
item.author: noreply@sigsiu.net (Sigrid Suski)

item.title: Import/Export App updated
item.description:
The update of the Import/Export App includes several bug fixes, better stability and some new languages.

Download the Import/Export Application from our Download Directory or directly via SobiPro repository!
item.author: noreply@sigsiu.net (Sigrid Suski)

item.title: Several Languages updated - Part I
item.description: Dutch, Croatian, Spanish and Simplified Chinese Languages updated and available to download in the Download Directory or directly from SobiPro Repository.
item.author: noreply@sigsiu.net (Sigrid Suski)

item.title: Danish Language available
item.description: Danish Language Package for SobiPro is available to download. Now SobiPro can be used in 21 different languages!
item.author: noreply@sigsiu.net (Sigrid Suski)

item.title: Router for SobiPro updated
item.description:
Router App 1.0 available for download and in Sigsiu.NET Repository.
It now supports also special tasks like alpha index or aggregation.

Download the new Router.
item.author: noreply@sigsiu.net (Sigrid Suski)

item.title: SobiPro 1.0.6 stable released
item.description:
We released SobiPro 1.0.6 stable today.
This is a maintenance release which solves several problems.
item.author: noreply@sigsiu.net (Sigrid Suski)
